channel.title: Remove fog of war?
channel.description: In simplest words - how to remove fog of war? :)

item.title: Remove fog of war?
item.dc:creator: @dedblu2005 dedblu2005@hotmail.com
item.description:
@dedblu2005 wrote:

Or just do it like this, so you’re not wasting system resources:

if (!super.keyF1Toggle) { gameCamera.zoom1 = 2400 + (this.cameraHeight * 2); gameCamera.zoom2 = 2400 + (this.cameraHeight * 2); gameCamera.zoom3 = 1; gameCamera.zoom4 = 2300 + (this.cameraHeight * 2); } else { gameCamera.zoom1 = 2200 + (this.cameraHeight * 2); gameCamera.zoom2 = 2200 + (this.cameraHeight * 2); gameCamera.zoom3 = 1; gameCamera.zoom4 = 2100 + (this.cameraHeight * 2); }
The difference is about 10% CPU usage on an AMD Athlon x4 620 @ 2.60GHz…

Also, the key values for up and down arrows are 1004 and 1005.
[/quote]

this was what i was looking for, thx for the help

Read full topic

item.title: Remove fog of war?
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

Crooks:

[quote]i edited this to false does nothing?

You must also change the gamecamera…
gameCamera.zoom1 = 99999;
gameCamera.zoom2 = 99999;
gameCamera.zoom3 = 1;
gameCamera.zoom4 = 99999;
Etc.[/quote]

Or just do it like this, so you’re not wasting system resources:

if (!super.keyF1Toggle) { gameCamera.zoom1 = 2400 + (this.cameraHeight * 2); gameCamera.zoom2 = 2400 + (this.cameraHeight * 2); gameCamera.zoom3 = 1; gameCamera.zoom4 = 2300 + (this.cameraHeight * 2); } else { gameCamera.zoom1 = 2200 + (this.cameraHeight * 2); gameCamera.zoom2 = 2200 + (this.cameraHeight * 2); gameCamera.zoom3 = 1; gameCamera.zoom4 = 2100 + (this.cameraHeight * 2); }
The difference is about 10% CPU usage on an AMD Athlon x4 620 @ 2.60GHz…

Also, the key values for up and down arrows are 1004 and 1005.

Read full topic

item.title: Remove fog of war?
item.dc:creator: @C_R_O_O_K_S C R O O K S
item.description:
@C_R_O_O_K_S wrote:

Okay, search after:

zoomCamera = true; <-- EDIT THIS TO FALSE if (lastWildYSubtract == 0 && (engineHandle.walkableValue[ourPlayer.currentX / 128][ourPlayer.currentY / 128] & 0x80) == 0) { if(showRoof) { gameCamera.addModel(engineHandle.aModelArrayArray598[lastWildYSubtract][i]); if (lastWildYSubtract == 0) { gameCamera.addModel(engineHandle.aModelArrayArray580[1][i]); gameCamera.addModel(engineHandle.aModelArrayArray598[1][i]); gameCamera.addModel(engineHandle.aModelArrayArray580[2][i]); gameCamera.addModel(engineHandle.aModelArrayArray598[2][i]); } } zoomCamera = false; } }

edit that i marked to false; and the shadow will be gone

Read full topic
